about_the_game:
Waterfowl hunting (also known as wildfowling) is the practice of hunting ducks, geese, or other waterfowl for food and sport.
Ok, that's enough snooty refinement. Now it's just you, your guns, your confident canine companion, and the great outdoors! In Duck Flighting (sic) you get to relive the iconic arcade experience of Duck Hunt in a brand new package.

But wait!
There's more.
– Many types of guns! Some, uh, better suited for hunting than others, but that just makes your feats all the more impressive, right?
– Hunt ducks and geese.
– The birds become faster every round.
– And don't forget your companion. We know – it's a German shepherd and they're not ideal for the job, but that's just the model we happened to have lying around.
– Where are your hunting grounds? Even we're not sure, and we honestly don't care either – they're lovely enough and the game is FUN.

So come on!
Give it a shot...
detailed_description:
Farmer Wars


About the Game

Waterfowl hunting (also known as wildfowling) is the practice of hunting ducks, geese, or other waterfowl for food and sport.
Ok, that's enough snooty refinement. Now it's just you, your guns, your confident canine companion, and the great outdoors! In Duck Flighting (sic) you get to relive the iconic arcade experience of Duck Hunt in a brand new package.

But wait!
There's more.
– Many types of guns! Some, uh, better suited for hunting than others, but that just makes your feats all the more impressive, right?
– Hunt ducks and geese.
– The birds become faster every round.
– And don't forget your companion. We know – it's a German shepherd and they're not ideal for the job, but that's just the model we happened to have lying around.
– Where are your hunting grounds? Even we're not sure, and we honestly don't care either – they're lovely enough and the game is FUN.

So come on!
Give it a shot...
name: Duck Flight Simulator 2021

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB

short_description: Duck Flighting may just be the ultimate experience in duck hunting simulation! And if it's not ultimate, we definitely guarantee it's an experience of some sort! With guns to fire, ducks to hunt, and a gorgeous nature scene to enjoy, we wish you all a fun time with our little project.
